skill.summary: Document system architecture and technical design decisions for effective team communication and ...
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation instructions for AI-assisted architecture documentation. No code execution, file access, network calls, or external commands detected. Safe for publication.

content.user_title: Document system architecture and design decisions
content.value_statement: Teams struggle to maintain clear, consistent architecture documentation. This skill provides structured templates and AI guidance to document systems, capture design decisions, and create visual diagrams for better team communication.
actual_capabilities: Analyze system components, data flows, and dependencies
Generate system architecture documentation with templates
Produce visual diagrams using Mermaid syntax
limitations: Does not access or analyze actual codebase files
Does not generate diagrams beyond text-based Mermaid syntax
Does not execute or verify architecture recommendations
Output quality depends on user-provided context

use_cases.title: Document Legacy Systems
use_cases.description: Reverse-engineer and document existing systems for modernization projects and stakeholder communication.

use_cases.title: Capture Design Decisions
use_cases.description: Create ADRs to record architectural choices, trade-offs, and rationale for future team reference.

use_cases.title: Plan Infrastructure
use_cases.description: Design deployment architecture diagrams and document infrastructure decisions for reliable operations.

prompt_templates.title: Simple Overview
prompt_templates.prompt: Describe the architecture of [SYSTEM_NAME] including main components, data flow, and key technology choices.

prompt_templates.title: Full Documentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive system architecture document for [SYSTEM] covering overview, components, data architecture, security, deployment, and scalability.

prompt_templates.title: ADR Template
prompt_templates.prompt: Write an Architecture Decision Record for [DECISION] including context, alternatives considered, the decision made, and consequences.

prompt_templates.title: Visual Diagram
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a Mermaid diagram showing [SYSTEM_COMPONENT] architecture including relationships, data flow, and integrations with external services.

output_examples.input: Document the architecture of our e-commerce platform
output: System overview with business context and technology stack
Component diagrams showing frontend, API gateway, and services
Data architecture with database schemas and caching strategy
Security measures including authentication and encryption
Deployment strategy with CI/CD pipeline and infrastructure

best_practices: Create Architecture Decision Records for all significant technical choices
Use visual diagrams to complement text documentation
anti_patterns: Documenting only implementation details without capturing rationale
Creating architecture docs that become outdated immediately
Writing documentation without considering the audience

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for generating architecture documentation.

faq.question: What file formats can it output?
faq.answer: Outputs markdown documentation with Mermaid diagrams and SQL schema examples.

faq.question: Does it integrate with documentation tools?
faq.answer: Generated markdown can be used with any markdown viewer, wiki, or docs platform.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill runs entirely in your AI session with no external data access or transmission.

faq.question: Why does output vary between runs?
faq.answer: AI generates documentation based on your input. More context produces better, more accurate results.

faq.question: How does this compare to documentation tools?
faq.answer: This skill generates content using AI. Static tools like Docusaurus or Confluence host the final documentation.
